I figured out a way to do it. It would simply be passed in the data field =
as follows:

curl -d "action=3Dlaunch&checkpoint=3D<CHECKPOINT_VALUE>" -k -=
u user:password --anyauth --location https://localhost:8443/engine/job/<JOB=
_NAME>
